resources.string: This app counts how many times you resume the app from the multitasking screen.\n When you go back to your homescreen from an app by pressing the home button to do other things, the app state is saved and can be resumed when you open it from the multitasking screen. This doesn\'t happen if you delibrately exit by, for example pressing the back button multiple times or by swiping from multitasking). If you do that, the counter will be reset.
